title: Fruit Punch Slushy
directions: Layer pineapple chunks, fruit punch, and orange juice in a blender. Fill the rest of blender with ice. Blend on medium to high speed until ice is crushed and mixture is slushy.
ingredients: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can frozen concentrated fruit punch
1 cup orange juice (such as SunnyD), or more to taste
1/2 cup ice cubes, or as desired
